::: {.cell hash='fig3-07-platte-carre-and-lcea_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_f9bee7f4e5249e161274c26032f7862c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(dplyr)
```
:::


Use the supplied `World` dataset (in lat-lon EPSG 4326) and make projections as required.


::: {.cell hash='fig3-07-platte-carre-and-lcea_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_ee8ec7c69f797fe1d7c3a20bcec5ee2b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
data("World") 
world <- World %>%
  select(geometry)

# Equal area with standard parallel at 0
world_lcea <- world %>%
  st_transform("+proj=cea")
```
:::


That's pretty much it. So here are the maps.


::: {.cell hash='fig3-07-platte-carre-and-lcea_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_af1b2f4eada84d536325ad217aaf2d30'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(world, bbox = bb(xlim = c(-180, 180),
                          ylim = c(-90, 90))) +
  tm_fill(col = "#aaeecc") +
  tm_graticules(x = seq(-180, 180, 15), y = seq(-90, 90, 15),
                labels.show = FALSE, lwd = 0.5) +
  tm_layout(inner.margins = 0, bg.color = "#ddeeff")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](fig3-07-platte-carre-and-lcea_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(world_lcea, bbox = bb(xlim = c(-180, 180),
                               ylim = c(-90, 90))) +
  tm_fill(col = "#aaeecc") +
  tm_graticules(x = seq(-180, 180, 15), y = seq(-90, 90, 15),
                labels.show = FALSE, lwd = 0.5) +
  tm_layout(inner.margins = 0, bg.color = "#ddeeff")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](fig3-07-platte-carre-and-lcea_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::
